title: Modern Hayes Valley 3BR/3BA Full Floor Luxury Flat - PROGRESSIVE
app_fee: Credit Check and Processing fee of $40.00 for applications
posting_body: ['Modern Hayes Valley 3BR/3BA Full Floor Luxury Flat - PROGRESSIVE', 'Property Address', '122-124 Haigh Street - 122 Haight Street | San Francisco, CA 94102', 'Available: Now', 'Offered By', 'Progressive Property Group, Inc.', 'Description', 'Located in heart of happening Hayes Valley, this full floor 3 bedroom / 3 bath flat has it all!', ' Newer construction (with the original period façade), luxury finishes, generous-size bedrooms, spacious open floor plan living space and a private outdoor space.', 'Plus location, location, location!', 'Steps from chic Hayes Street, the San Francisco Ballet and Opera.', 'And blocks from the Octavia freeway entrance to highways 101 and 280 and the Market Street public transit corridor.', 'Additional features of this lovely, spacious 3 Bedroom / 3 Bath full floor flat includes:', '- Strikingly modern unit', '- Almost new finishes including floors, cabinetry, plumbing fixtures, doors, sliding deck doors, etc.', '- Custom window coverings', '- LVP radiant heat floors throughout with custom tile in bathrooms', '- Open living room and kitchen; perfect for entertainment', '- Chef’s kitchen with ample cabinets and counters and top-of-the-line appliances including  6 burner Bertazzoni gas range and oven, dishwasher, refrigerator, microwave', '-Generous size bedrooms with 2 en suite bathroom for the 2 main bedrooms and both with direct access to the exclusive use patio.', '3rd bedroom is separated from the living areas with a sectional slider doors.', ' 3rd full size bathroom is off the main hallway.', '- In-unit washer-dryer', '- Recessed lighting with designer light fixtures', '- Bicycle storage included', '- Radiant heating', '- Exclusive patio off the living room and both master bedrooms – perfect spot for the outdoor dining, grilling, siting area', 'Rent $6,750 per month (including bicycle storage)', '12 month lease', 'All utilities by tenant', 'No pets but we do comply with all applicable rental laws', 'Ready for occupancy', 'Security Deposit: 1.5 times rent', 'LOCATION: 122 Haight Street @ Laguna Street', 'For questions, or to schedule a private showing, please reply to this ad or text / call', 'show contact info', 'CA BRE License # 01905856', 'Progressive Property Group', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 3BD/3.0BA', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $6,750.00', 'Available: Now', 'Application Fee: $40.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats not allowed', 'Dogs not allowed']
